channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Olive Garden’s parent company is betting on a new deal with Uber to revive its pasta empire
item.description: The restaurant operator plans to offer nationwide delivery for Olive Garden through a two-year partnership with Uber.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: FedEx, Nike, Constellation Energy and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in midday trading.

item.title: Were Chipotle and Nvidia in the vanguard of a stock-split resurgence?
Disney says most of its business will stop using Slack by the end of the year
item.description: A hacktivist group called NullBulge leaked data from almost 10,000 of Disney’s Slack channels in July.

item.title: With a big interest rate cut in the books, Tom Lee says the 'Fed put' is back in play
item.description: As the central bank pivots from a focus on fighting inflation, it signals an important moment for investors.

item.title: U.S. stocks trading lower at midday as Fed-cut rally pauses — live coverage

item.description: “Listings with a turfed pet area, coworking space, or community happy hours are drawing more interest as renters appear to be prioritizing practical a...

item.title: FTC sues drug middlemen for allegedly inflating insulin prices
item.description: The FTC suit targets the three biggest so-called pharmacy benefit managers, UnitedHealth Group's Optum Rx, CVS Health's Caremark and Cigna's Express S...

item.title: Trump social-media stock ‘DJT’ falls further as insider-sales lockup lifts
Trump Media nosedives to record low on the first day Trump and other insiders can sell their shares
item.description: The company has lost more than half of its value since Kamala Harris entered the race.

item.title: Fed Governor Waller says inflation softening faster than he expected put him in half-point-cut camp
item.description: Waller told CNBC that the data is showing core inflation in the Fed's preferred measure is running below 1.8%

item.title: Nike has subbed in a new CEO. Will that be a game changer?
Microsoft strikes deal to reopen Three Mile Island, site of the worst nuclear accident in U.S. history, to power its AI data centers
item.description: Company plans to use plant’s undamaged reactor to power its AI data centers.

item.title: Trump Media hits new 52-week low after DJT lockup restrictions expire
item.description: Former President Donald Trump's majority stake in the Truth Social owner was worth more than $1.5 billion mid-morning Friday.

item.title: Brazil drought may push coffee prices still higher
